question.title: Build operation failed. Could not create several tasks
question.body:
I get the following error message when trying to build an app.

A build operation failed.
Could not create task ':app:compileDebugAndroidTestJavaWithJavac'.
Could not create task ':app:compileDebugAndroidTestJavaWithJavac'.
Failed to calculate the value of task ':app:compileDebugAndroidTestJavaWithJavac' property 'javaCompiler'.
Cannot find a Java installation on your machine matching this tasks requirements: {languageVersion=17, vendor=ADOPTIUM, implementation=vendor-specific} for MAC_OS on     aarch64.
No locally installed toolchains match and toolchain download repositories have not been configured.

I have the following code in my build.gradle:

compileOptions {
    sourceCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_17
    targetCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_17
}
java {
    toolchain {
        languageVersion = JavaLanguageVersion.of(17)
        vendor = JvmVendorSpec.ADOPTIUM // Or use JvmVendorSpec.TEMURIN
    }
}

Checking terminal I have the newest java version: openjdk version "17.0.13" 2024-10-15
